nodes.text: Gormo Vosadii Grasso was a Hutt and the owner of the Gus Treta Inner-System Market Station during the Galactic Civil War. He worked with the Scion's builders Hoersch-Kessel Drive, Inc. to stack modular expansions atop the station. He was dishonored among the Vosadii for a botched spice smuggling enterprise.
